user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion and I need some help with the arrangements. Can you provide me with the details of a specific player currently online on the VRising server? Also, I would like to know the player count on the server. Furthermore, I need the full description of the server to ensure it's suitable for our family event. Lastly, I'm looking for imbuements for the Lich Shroud (Death Protection) in Tibia Items.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of a specific player currently online on the VRising server.
Retrieve the current player count on the VRising server.
Get the full description of the VRising server to evaluate its suitability for the family event.
Find imbuements for the Lich Shroud (Death Protection) in Tibia Items.
